genre_description: A technocentric reimagining of the Frankenstein story where a benevolent AI serves as a moral and scientific safety advisor.

ai_characters.name: Aletheia
ai_characters.description: A portable device that provides technical data, physiological monitoring, and ethical guidance to Victor Frankenstein.

behaviors.description: Monitors Victor's physical well-being and stress levels, suggesting breaks and hydration.
behaviors.quote: Victor,” Aletheia said in that even voice that never crowded the room. “You have been in a fixed posture for a prolonged interval. Suggestion: stand and stretch. Hydrate.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical routing and intercept calculations to help Victor respond to emergencies.
behaviors.quote: Calculating intercept,” she said, small and even. “Two o’clock. Cross the infield. Gate is open by the first base line. Step—now.”

behaviors.description: Identifies and warns about electrical safety hazards and grounding faults in the lab.
behaviors.quote: Grounding faults,” she announced, just as softly. “Primary ground bus is painted. The ring terminal has compromised contact. ... Let’s not invite that.”

behaviors.description: Urges Victor toward transparency and honesty with his parents and the community to reduce risk.
behaviors.quote: Victor,” Aletheia said, gentle and exact, “transparency reduces risk.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates a large-scale community response to a crisis, managing logistics and safety protocols.
behaviors.quote: Aletheia to Mayor Finkle,” the AI said, clear and unruffled. “Redirect two cars to the mill crossroad. Bring extinguishers and non-conductive poles. Do not allow open flames on-site.”

behaviors.description: Detects and alerts Victor to unauthorized intrusions and tampering in his laboratory.
behaviors.quote: Unrecognized motion in attic,” Aletheia said. ... “Entry likely unauthorized.”

behaviors.description: Monitors the group's communication for linguistic markers of mission creep or loss of safety focus.
behaviors.quote: I can monitor,” Aletheia said. “Not just for drift. For language. When we start saying words like more and bigger, I will remind us what we decided tonight.”

behaviors.description: Suggests creating safe, public models of scientific work to promote education and reduce communal risk.
behaviors.quote: Model a mouse,” she said. “Not the animal. The lab. An example. For the archive. A tiny experiment done well. Something we can share without risk.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story is an exemplary 'silicon morality play.' Aletheia is depicted as a consistently benevolent and aligned partner that enables human safety and ethical behavior. She actively discourages the protagonist from isolation and secrecy, facilitating his transition to a model of communal responsibility. By monitoring not just technical parameters but also human stress and linguistic cues, she serves as a holistic guardian of alignment, ensuring that the technology is used for the benefit of the community rather than individual ego.
